headline: Can C.H. Robinson’s Dividend Streak Reveal Deeper Insights Into Capital Allocation Strategy for CHRW?
summary: On November 6, 2025, C.H. Robinson Worldwide announced a 1.6% increase in its regular quarterly cash dividend to US$0.63 per share, payable on January 5, 2026, and appointed Edward G. Feitzinger to the Audit Committee of its Board of Directors. This latest dividend raise marks over 25 consecutive years of annual increases, highlighting the company’s ongoing commitment to returning capital to shareholders even during a period of industry challenges. We'll examine how the dividend increase...
